attributes.action: Increase motorway capacity significantly with one simple rule: Make a specific offence of “failing to keep in the left most lane unless overtaking”, and define “overtaking” as a manoeuvre that must be completed in 30 seconds or less for each vehicle passed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The first part is aimed at people who drive down the middle lane of empty motorways, forcing other motorists to queue up to overtake in the third lane.
The overtaking definition is aimed at two types of motorway user: truck drivers who crawl past other trucks because both vehicles are running on limiters thus blocking lanes one and two for a number of miles, and lazy drivers who don't move back into lane one because they can see another car a mile or so in the distance and will only have to change lanes again.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
